message: Been looking to take the wife on a vacation and wondering if anyone knows of some good sites that have great deals on vacation packages (flight + hotel)?
I can't think of anything off the stop of my head. My wife and I just search around on Google until we find the best prices for what we need.
Southwest has great deals - only caveat is that SW is limited in where they go...
http://www.vacationstogo.com/ has some good deals.  http://www.kayak.com/ is good for general air and hotel searching.
Thanks all! Wife scored us a cheap cruise next month! Woot!
Where are you guys going and what cruise line?
wotif.com can also be good for cheap accommodation - it's pretty much all the days the hotels couldn't sell.
